game.name: KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX-
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 「KINGDOM HEARTS」 시리즈의 원점이 되는 첫 번째 작품부터 토대로 한 6작품을 수록한 『KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX-』가 Steam으로 발매! 꿈같은 모험을 지금 바로 떠나 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX- is an HD remastered collection of 6 unforgettable KINGDOM HEARTS experiences. Take up your Keyblade to save the Disney worlds from darkness.

reviewHighlights.text: Having played these games like 15 years ago, while also not remembering too much of the story and stuff, I had the right amount of nostalgia to truly...
This game is the reason why I got an autism diagnosis. (played on playstation, xbox, now pc) 10/10
